title: Global Carbon Markets Conference
author: unknown
text: Scaling a credible and transparent Carbon market in pursuit of net-zero goals • Understand the global outlook and growth estimates for the Carbon market •Compare emission reduction and removal Carbon credits in relation to pricing trends • Examining environmental product pricing, trading, and innovations • Consider the interaction of the Voluntary Carbon markets with the Compliance Carbon markets • Delve into the role of Standards in Carbon markets and the quality of Carbon credits
excerpt: ** Meta description, 70-155 characters [Example: This panel discussion focuses on how businesses are handling these extraordinary times, and where the power markets are heading]
